parameter_mapping.code:
start_date = datetime.strptime("{{params.startDate}}", "%Y-%m-%d") 
end_date = datetime.strptime("{{params.endDate}}", "%Y-%m-%d") 
for day in range(start_date.day, end_date.day):
    start_date_iso = start_date.replace(day=day).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
    end_date_iso = start_date.replace(day=day+1).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
    eventToSend = {"startDate": start_date_iso, "endDate": end_date_iso}
    eventToSend.update({{params.extraFields}})
    sendEvent(eventToSend)
